comments:
NOTE : The following exception occurs only when the code is starting 
       from line 5 as you can see below.

Write the following code :
(the numbers only indicate line numbers)

1
2
3
4
5 <?php
6 require_once('')
7 ?>
8

Now start deleting only the brackets '' one by one from right to left.
You will see the following exception when you complete deleting both:
